summary:
VHACO received call from SSA stating that they received documentation for 28 patients that they did not request information for.
Incident Update
03/11/13:
Per VHA electronic documents were included in the transmission of 28 Veteran records. SSA reported this information to VHA Privacy Office. The VHA privacy
Office notified the VAMHCS PO to investigate. The PO is waiting for permission to speak with the field to provide us with additional information., This was identified
during a quality check by SSA. The ROI Department at the VAMHCS is unable to provide the names of the Veterans and the information included as yet.
3/13/13:
According to the Privacy Officer, it appears copies of the medical records for 28 patients was sent electronically to SSA. Which means the patient's full name; full
SSN, DOB, health information etc. The Facility is still waiting to clarify with SSA exactly which patients were included in the 28. The ROI staff have identified 3
patients that were sent on the date inferred. The investigation continues.
Therefore 28 Patients will recieve a HIPAA notification letter.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
